txt.en: Healing Khûtra, Part 1
Return to Heshra, the herbalist
‘Please hurry, villagers are depending on it!’

'That last salve proved the key. Can you help me gather enough ingredients that we may heal our fish, our animals and our people? We need large quantities of calendula and delphinium. I have the other ingredients here. I happen to know the local merchant, Ziriha, has large quantities dried.'
You are too far away to administer the salve
Give dried ingredients to Heshra, the herbalist
'Heshra has found a cure? That is joyous news indeed. Here, take all the ingredients you need, with my blessing. No, no keep your coin. It's bad business to make a profit off any of this suffering.'
Administer the improved salve to afflicted villagers ([placeholder]/4)
Administer the salve to an afflicted villager
Administer the salve to an afflicted villager
Administer salve to afflicted Khûtra villagers. They can be found on the rocks just outside of Khûtra, to the east.
Administered salve to afflicted Khûtra villagers ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Administer the salve to an afflicted villager

'Ahh yes, fine quality, as usual. Just a moment, let me add this to what I already have. Here, take this. Please, our afflicted are below here, on the rocks just outside the village. Not a moment to spare! Give each some of the salve, and they should be back on their way to good health.'
Administer the salve to an afflicted villager
Administered salve to afflicted villagers ([placeholder]/4)
You are too far away to administer the salve
Administer salve to afflicted Khûtra villager
Heshra has asked you to bring him large quantities of the ingredients he needs for the improved healing salve.
You are too far away to administer the salve
Heshra has asked you to procure large quantities of ingredients he needs from Ziriha, the merchant. She can be found near the fishing pier.
Administer the improved salve to the afflicted villagers.

'I can't thank you enough for what you have done here. Please, take what is left and go see Elder Ilaya. She oversees all our livestock. I'm sure she would appreciate some help tending to the afflicted animals.'
Give dried ingredients to Heshra, the herbalist
Give dried ingredients to Heshra, the herbalist
Return to Heshra the herbalist in the Elder Hall.
